column1: ConditionsMaintain 4 ft path of travel along public right of wayduring all construction times and dates.No work shall commence before 7AM or after 7PMwithout a proper night noise permit from SFDPW andSpecial Traffic Permit from SFMTA.Event/Operation:1609-10 Line truck roaming to access utilty poles forfiber optic cable placement and lining along 16th stfrom Guerro St to South Van Ness StPermit Linear Footage320Elements of Occupancyaerial boom truck and cable reelFrom:7/31/2017 07:00AMStart Time7:00AMTo:8/1/2017 05:00PMEnd Time05:00PMNeed to call for InspectionNeed to post tow-away signTo activate and register this permit for towing, followthe tow-away sign activation and photo uploadprocess.  To tow a vehicle call the Tow Desk at (415)553-1200.Special Traffic permit requiredCALL FOR Special traffic permit MAY BE required(Please check DPT Blue Book for any trafficrestrictions; to obtain a "Blue Book", please contactMTA at (415) 701-4673).Food:NOther:Performing Arts:NStreet Space Hours7:00AM Thru 05:00PMMeter Segment(s)16TH ST: JULIAN AVE to RONDEL PL (3055 - 3073)07/31/2017 thru 08/01/2017 (2 days) 16TH ST:CALEDONIA ST to VALENCIA ST (3072 - 3099)07/31/2017 thru 08/01/2017 (2 days) 16TH ST:VALENCIA ST to ALBION ST (3100 - 3139)07/31/2017 thru 08/01/2017 (2 days) 16TH ST:ALBION ST to GUERRERO ST (3153 - 3199)07/31/2017 thru 08/01/2017 (2 days)Night NoiseWork Scope

column2: - Bike corral present.  The Contractor shall contact Ryan Dodge of theSFMTA at ryan.dodge@sfmta.com if an on-street bicycle parking corralmay potentially conflict with the Contractor’s work or if theContractor’s work may potentially damage the on-street bicycle parkingcorral. Ryan Dodge will provide details and cost estimates payable bythe Contractor if removal and re-installation is required.
- Bike Share Station.  Please contactconstruction@bayareabikeshare.com and bikeshare@sfmta.com cc tocoordinate.
- Parking sensors are located in the parking spaces on this street.Please contact Alex Demisch of SFMTA/SFpark at (415) 701-4507 oralex.demisch@sfmta.com to coordinate

- Under G095 requirement, Contractor shall contact Muni OverheadLine Division of any work 10 feet in horizontal or vertical direction ofoverhead lines. Contact: Clifford Smethurst @Clifford.Smethurst@sfmta.com, (415) 554-9220.
Phoenix Electric Company - Conflict with existing excavation permit.  Itis mandatory that you coordinate all work for joint paving.
16TH ST / SOUTH VAN NESS AVE - CAPP ST -
Walsh Construction Company - Conflict with existing excavationpermit.  It is mandatory that you coordinate all work for joint paving.
Pacific Gas & Electric - Conflict with existing excavation permit.  It ismandatory that you coordinate all work for joint paving.
Department of Technology - Conflict with existing excavation permit.  Itis mandatory that you coordinate all work for joint paving.
